Class Question

java.lang.Object
models.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a question in the Q and A system. This class manages question details including title, description, tags, answers and resolution status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Creates a new Question with the specified details.

      title - The title of the question
      description - The detailed description of the question
      tags - List of tags associated with the question
      authorUsername - Username of the question author
